required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 2a, Dose-ranging Study With PF-05221304 in Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease (NAFLD)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2a, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Dose-ranging, Parallel Group Study To Evaluate Safety, Tolerability, And Pharmacodynamics Of Pf-05221304 Administered Daily For 16-weeks To Adult Subjects With Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease

brief_summary.textblock: Phase 2a, dose-ranging Study with PF-05221304 in Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease (NAFLD)

detailed_description.textblock: A Phase 2a, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Dose-ranging, Parallel Group Study To Evaluate Safety, Tolerability, And Pharmacodynamics Of PF-05221304 Administered Daily For 16-weeks To Adult Subjects With Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: C1171002 is a randomized, double blind, placebo controlled, 5 arm (placebo, plus 4 active doses of PF 05221304), parallel group study.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate Dose-Response for Effect on Liver Fat using MRI-PDFF
primary_outcome.description: Percent change from baseline in liver fat, as assessed using MRI-PDFF, at Week 16

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate Dose-Response for Effect on ALT
secondary_outcome.description: Percent change from baseline in ALT, at Week 16
Evaluation of safety-related clinical laboratory tests
Including measurement of Blood Pressure and Pulse rate

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body Mass Index >= 25 kg/m2
- Body Weight > 50 kg
- Liver fat (assessed via MRI-PDFF) >= 8%
- Biopsy-proven NASH - diagnosed in previous 24-months
- Presumed NASH - per Sponsor's definition
- NAFLD with minimal inflammation/fibrosis
- Features of Metabolic Syndrome
Exclusion Criteria:
- Alcohol-induced steatohepatitis or other forms of chronic liver disease
- Positive for Hepatitis B, Hepatitis C, or Human Deficiency Virus
- Severe Renal Impairment
- Contraindications for MRI
